com.facebook.buck.parser.cache.impl

Class CachingProjectBuildFileParserDecorator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.parser.api.ForwardingProjectBuildFileParserDecorator
      • com.facebook.buck.parser.cache.impl.CachingProjectBuildFileParserDecorator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProjectBuildFileParser, AutoCloseable

    public class CachingProjectBuildFileParserDecorator
extends ForwardingProjectBuildFileParserDecorator
    This class uses the ParserCache for parsing build specs, delegating to normal parse when necessary.

        parserCache - the ParserCache implementation.
